Que persone prescripte in folio presenti ex vtraque parte consencierunt et elige
runt ad mandatum littere supremi domini nostri Regis preposito ballivis consulibus et
communitati dicti burgi direct' sub Sigillo priuato / que littera pretendebat in se
eligere prepositum balliuos et officiarios secundum acta parliamenti et temporibus anti
quitis consuetis et secundum ordinem electionis officiariorum in burgo

runt in liberos burgensos et confratres gilde videlicet dictus Alexander tulidef racione
paterne libertatis / et thomas fraser ex eo quod desponsauit filiam burgensis
huius burgi / prestito solito Juramento de vtroque et cetera

Die viijua mensis octobris anno Domini et cetera lxxixno Subscripte persone electe

Quo die Johannes skynnar constituit et ordinavit
Thomam prat suum verum procuratorem et assignatum irreuocabilem ad redimendum
vnam caudam terre sue Jacentis in le Schipraw alias ut asseretur impig
nerant thome quhite de manibus ipsius thome In forma debi
ta et consueta et in latissima forma procuratorij

Eodem die ordinatus fuit per balliuos et per totam curiam / quod thomas prat procura
tor dicti Johannis skynnar et thomas quhite comparebunt coram ballivis die lu
ne ad quindenam immediate sequentem / Ad ostendendum et producendum omnia Jura
sua illius caude terre dicti quondam Johannis skynnar et testes tanquam die peremptor
dictis partibus limitato

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xv die octobris
Anno Domini et cetera lxxixno /

quo die Alexander cowtis conuictus per assisam adiudicatur
in duobus amerciamentis in vno videlicet pro iniusta perturbacione domini Alexandri club capellanj
et in alio pro perturbio Alexandri howison / et tenetur emendare eisdem ad visum proborum

Eodem die cristiana Dunbrekk et quedem mariota amerciatur pro perturbacione adinuicem
in verbo / et emendabunt sibi adinuicem ad visum proborum virorum
Curia balliuorum tenta per balliuos xijo die mensis octoberoctobris anno quo supra

quo die Jacobus smytht conquestus est balliuis protribunali sedentibus de perturbio
sibj fact' per patricium fyf post inuencionem plegiorum legalem recepit Inter dictum
Jacobum et patricium hill Quiquid ballivi mandarunt Dauid Duncanj sergeandum
ad attachiandum eundem patricium fif ad comparendum coram eiusdem dicto patricio
fyf tunc presente quj sergeandus accessit ad eundem patricium fyff ipsum
ostentando ad comparendum coram dictis ballivis quj comparere recusauit Tandem
dicti ballivi dictum sergeandum ostentarunt ut predictum patricium fyf cum virga
suj officij attachiaret quj venire neglexit dicendo si se tangeret cum virga
sua quod percuteret se cum pugno super dentes et sic inobedienter recessit
de pretorio non obediendo dictis balliuis

Eodem die Actio perturbij mota Inter Jacobus smytht et patricium hill
posita fuit ad assisam proborum quj mature auisiata diliberarunt
quod dictus patricius hill conuictus fuit de perturbio dicte Jacobi Ipso
patricio prestante Juramentum corporale quod non proiecit lapidem neque globum
ad seruum dicti Jacobi smytht Et dictus patricius de predicto Jacobo
smytht non est conquestus dicendo quod non fecit sibj iniuriam

Eodem die gilbertus leche deuenit plegius pro predicto Jacobo smytht
quod patricius hill erit Indempnes pro eo nisi quod Jura volunt

Curia capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xo
die Januarij Anno Domini et cetera lxxixno Quo die secta vocata et curia affirmata
absentes patent in Rotulo sectarum

Presentes in consilio Alexander menyes thomas fif alexander chavmer filius Johannes de Knollis
Dauid colison Dauid menyes iunior alexander rede thomas chavmer Johannes stewart Johannes
Wormot alexander hay Johannes glenmalvin David Kintor gilbertus leche Andreas buchan gilbertus
chavmer Robertus prat David symson Dauid mathoson alexander howison

quhilkis personis of the consel has ordanit / that thar be na ayl salde derrar'
than viij d' the gallon' / and that ail tobe als gude as the ail that
wes sald of before for xij d' a gallon' quhen malt was at derth
and gif it be nocht sa gude / that it be sald for vj d' a gallon' / and
gif it be nocht worth vj d' / that it be saulde for iiijor the gallon'

Item thai haf ordanit that the baxtaris sal baik gude and sufficient brede
contenande xvj vncis of gude and sufficient stuf the penny laif at
the leist / And quha sa failyeis tharof and beis tayntit and convict tharof
the ballies sal punys' thaim as law wil / and depart thare brede
at the cors til pure folkis

Eodem die accedens ad barram magister Alexander fif capellanus et procurator
altaris Sancti michaelis in ecclesia parrochiali huius burgi protestatus fuit pro quondam
annuo redditu quadraginta denariorum sibi debit' de vna terra vasta Ja
cente in capite vici nauium dicti burgi / inter terram Alexandri de camera ex boreali
parte / et terram thome prat ex australi parte / Ad quam terram acce
dens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos presentauit in
in curia coram ballivis tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Dauid
spens Antonio scissore et philippo de Dunbrek sergeando

The samyn dai the consale aboue writin has ordanit / that thar pass' thre
commissaris to the parliament for the releisching of the schippis that ar
arrestit and the Salmond being in thaim and for vthiris causis be
langing the toune / that is tosay Alexander of chavmer aldirman Alexander
meignes and John' of Knollis / and the said consale has consentit tore
leve thaim til part of the expensis

Eodem die magister Thomas stane Thomas stane capellanus ac procurator Altaris
beati Stephanj prothomartiris situati in ecclesia beati nicholai huius burgi
accessit ad barram et protestatus pro vno annuo redditu tresdecim
solidorum et quatuor denariorum debito annuatim et a longo tempore non solut'
de terra vasta antedicta Jacente in capite vici nauium et cetera Ad quam
terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos presentavit in curia tanquam primo die processus Testibus supradictis
videlicet Dauid spens Antonio scissore et philippo Dunbrek
sergeando / quam quidem protestacionem dictus magister thomas fecit tanquam procurator principalis capellanorum colle
gij ecclesie parrochiali de abirdene pro dicto annuo redditu leuand' nomine et ex parte dictorum capellanorum et sui et cetera

The same dai before the aldirman and consel / Dauid Kintor on the ta part /
and Macolm mowat on the tothir part / ar oblist be the faith
of thar bodijs til vndirly ane assise vnsuspect anent al and sundrie
debatis and clamys betuix the saidis parties dependand in sa fer as
concernis the temporal law / on mononday next eftir the hame cuming
of the Aldirman fra Edinburgh

Item the same dai the ballies has chargit Duncan of stralogh seriand
til warne the wif of Richard henrison and totak sufficiant souertie of
hir til comper in the court before the ballies this day xv daies til
answer' til the borgh strekit apon hir be patrik thomson' / becaus'
he gerd hir nocht comper' this day as he wes ordanyt

Thomas sadlar conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in duobus amerciatis in vno
videlicet pro iniusta perturbacione Alanj smyth et in alio pro perturbio alexandri
stokar et tenetur emendare partibus lesis ad visum proborum virorum

Alexander balcromy' per concessionem propriam amerciatur pro iniusta perturbacione Johannis
pawdy scissoris / et emendabit eidem vt Jura volunt

Eodem die Johannes Irwyn' pelliparius tanquam decanus pellipariorum
inuenit Willelmum more plegium legalem pro eo et ceteris personis dicti ar
tificij / quod henricus bawne pelliparius et pars sua erunt indempnes aliter
quam per viam Juris Et Andreas murra senior deuenit plegius legalis pro dicto
henrico bawne et parte sua / quod omnes pelliparij huius burgi erunt
indempnes de eo et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris

The samyn dai Schir' / Waltir yungar chaplan is oblist be the faith
of his body til the aldirman and consale before writin / that alslang
as he gettis ten markis of gude payment yerly and five dais
met in the oulk / he sal remain and mak sic seruice in the kirk
as he can or may do / at his gudely power / and alslang as
it likis the toune til hald him And gif he failyeis in ony ser
vice making / he salbe correkit be the sicht of the aldirman
ballies and counsale of this burgh et cetera

Item the said dai James clerk becom ful dettour to the aldirman and bal
lies tocontent and pay til Dauid hil be fastrinyevyn' nixt tocum
twenty merkis The quhilk todo he has bundin his lande
and gude

The samen dai the ballies gerd cal before thame al the baxtaris
and schew to thaim the ordinance of the consale anent the baking of
thare brede as is contenit in the ait made tharupon' the quhilk

div.p:
The xviij dai of Januar' the yer' of god et cetera lxxix yeris / maistir Androw
cadiou and Adam bachiller messinger til our Soueran lord present a lettre
of our soueran lordis vndir his Signet subscriuit with his hand direct to
the aldirman baillies consale and communite of the burgh of Abirdene / and in absence
of the Aldirman and part of the consale and mony of the communite / the said lettir
was present til thir personis vndirwritin / that is tosay Androw scherar John' of marr' Robert
blindsel thomas prat Dauid colison' thomas of chavmer Robert of culan
Alexander howison Dauid symson gilbert the Waus Johne the vaus alexander
rede James cumyng William blindsel yungar Alexander marr Dauid
mathoson gilbert of chamer Johne stevynson Androw murray eldar Wil
liam the hay / Alexander the hay Dauid Kyntor William blindsel eldar
Eduard the hay Adam of craufurd Wat of aghneif Alexander nach
ty androw branch and Robert of Kintor / the quhilk lettre proportit that
our Soueran lord desirit and chargit the Aldirman ballies consale and
communite that the said maistir Androw cadiou suld be assignay til his
awnt cristiane of cadiou the spous' of vmquhile Androw alanson'
quhom god assoilye / of ane half nett of the Raik apon' the wattir
of Dee / for the quhilk scho allegis that scho has payit hir girsome'
as the lettre proportis / The quhilkis personis before writin / has gran
tit for thame in alsfer as thai mycht or had power' / that the saide
maistir Androw cadiou salbe ressauit as assignay til hir erar'
than ony vthir man of ony watteris or takkis of fischingis that
scho had has or may haf in tyme tocum et cetera

In curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio die predicto / Willelmus de camera
carpentarius conuictus per assisam amerciatur / quare intrauit domum thome
gray et perturbauit vxorem ipsius thome et familiam eiusdem et
tenetur emendare eisdem ad visum proborum virorum et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem
xixno die Januarij Anno Domini et cetera lxxixno

Quo die penes vnum gallum clamatum per Andream mason a cristino
prat carnifice asseren' eundem ab eo fuisse iniuste alienat' / assisa
desuper electa et Jurata Reperit determinauit et pronunciavit quod dictus
gallus pertinet prefato cristino prat ex dono thome prat et cetera

Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xxiiij
die Januarij anno predicto

Quo die Dauid menyes iunior burgensis dicti burgi de mandato Jonete
menyes sororis sue in presencia ballivorum protribunali sedentibus / deliberauit Eli
zabeth Irwin matri Johannis ruthirfurd et magistro Andree cadiou
nomine et ex parte dicti Johannis duas cartas illius tenementi sui Jacentis
in vico castri dicti burgi ex parte australi eiusdem inter terram Alexandri menyes
ex parte occidentali et terram hered' quondam Andree ancroft ex orientali parte
vnam videlicet donacionis et concessionis dicti tenementi cum pertinenciis fact' per
quondam Willelmum crab Johanni Ruthirfurd hereditarie in libero burgagio
vt patet plenius in eadem Et aliam cartam pure vendicionis et alienacionis
annuj redditus et iij s' iiij d' exeunt' de dicto tenemento per prefatum Willelmum
crab dicto Johanni ruthirfurd vt plenius habetur in eadem

Eodem die Alexander rolland filius quondam Willelmi roland burgensis de Abirdene
cum suo prelocutore Dauid menyes iuniore fecit constituit et ordinauit
carissimum fratrem suum Thomam Rollande suum verum legittimum curatum ad
Regendum et gubernandum suam personam terras redditus et possessiones ac
cetera bona sua mobilia et immobilia sibi de Jure quomodolibet Incumbencia
absque aliqua Reuocacione fienda super et quosque ad perfectam et legittimam
etatem peruenerit / dicto Alexandro iam existen' ut asseretur et actingen' ad eta
tem xv annorum Ita tamen quod dictus Thomas curatus antedictus proui
deat diligenter pro terris et bonis ipsius Alexandri / et ad commodum et profi
cuum dicti Alexandri durante tempore prenotato videlicet donec ad perfectam pertingat
etatem / Testibus Jacobo cumyne Willelmo blinsel ballivis magistris An
drea cadiow thoma strathachin notario Willelmo more Waltero rolland
Dauid prat Andrea murray seniore et Johanne henrici cum domino Roberto
leis notario et multis alliis

In Curia ballivorum tenta xxvj die Januarij anno et cetera lxxixno Andreas
lammynton et cristiana lermond amerciatur pro perturbacione adinuincem in verbo
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xxix die Januarij Anno Domini supradicto /

quo die
Alanus smyth per propriam confessionem adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro perturbacione
eiusdem curie perturbando Nicolaum mason in verbo et emendabit ei ad visum
proborum virorum Vnde assisa ordinavit ipsum ad deliberandum j li' cere ad mis
sam Sancti sanguinis in partem emende
Item Nicholaus mason' in amerciamento pro perturbacione curie prout compertum fuit per assisam

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vltima die mensis
Januarij anno quo supra

The samyn day maistir Alexander of culan forspekar for Richard henrison'
anent the clame of xxvj s' clamit be Androw scot in the name and the behalf
of Johne neilson of montros fra William of gariach borch and dettour as the
said androw rehersit for Richard henrison / the quhilk some' the said maistir
Alexander allegit is pait to the said John' neilson / and perofferit him toprefe
the payment of the said some / and gif the said John' neilson wald cum
here within viij or x dais and swere with the said androw / that the said some'
wes nocht pait / that he suld content and pay the said some' incontinent eftir his
aith

Item the same' dai Richard henrison forsaid has grantit in Jugement tofree
Wil of garuiach of the said borowgang anent Androw scot And the saide
Wilyeam has constitute and ordanit the said Richard his lauchful procurator
todefend him and kepe him scaithles anent the said hAndrow scot of the saide
borowgang and some'

Johne of Irwin skynnar' is adiugit in amerciament of the court for strublans
of the ton' and the officiaris defamand thaim sayand that he couth get na
Justice of his complaint made to thaim / of the quhilk he wes conuict be
ane sworn' assise of worthy burgez et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem die prima
mensis februarij Anno Domini et cetera lxxixno /

quo die marioria ettale posuit
se in voluntate ballivorum pro iniusta perturbacione Jonete Wenton / super qua et cetera
conuicta fuit per assisam vnde adiudicatur in amerciamento et cetera
In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio quarto die februarij anno Domini supradicto /

Johannes skynnar'
fatebatur se debitorem xliiij solidorum pro quibus traxit Dauid spens in plegiagium Ja
cobo Kennarty / et dixit quod releuabit et indempnem seruabit eundem Dauid de
plegiagio antedicto / vnde ballivi prescriptibant dicto Dauid facen' se plegium
penes prefatum Jacobum ad satisfaciendum sibi infra terminum Juris / et dicto Johanni ad releuandum
ipsum Dauid de dicto plegiagio similiter infra terminum Juris

Robertus de abirdour in amerciamento pro regrariacione plegij porrecti per Johannem chepman
asseren' quod quidam testes producti per dictum Robertum in causa mota inter eum et ipsum Robertum
remoueri debent tanquam suspecti a testimonio in huiusmodi causa pro eo quod non Juridice
adducti fuerant ad huiusmodi testimonium perhibendum veluti wardat' fuit per curiam

Eodem die Dauid spens clamabat ab Antonio scissore vij s' pro quibus de
uenit plegius pro andrea croune / et dictus Antonius allegavit dictum Dauid
esse solutum per debitorem principalem / qui quidem Dauid negavit et eciam Juravit per sacra dei
euuangelia quod nunquam optinuit solucionem a principali debitore / quare dictus antonius
adiudicatur soluere dictam summam dicto Dauid infra quindenam

Robertus de Abirdour in amerciamento pro iniusta porrectione plegij super Johanne chepman penes
le marrowschip in piscacione de le furdis et ipse Johannes quitus factus fuit per
assisam de clameo dicti Roberti

Domini et cetera lxxixno /

quo die Andreas lowson carnifex per prelocutorem suum gilbertum vaus
posuit se in voluntate ballivorum pro iniusta perturbacione et percussione Johannis gardnar' et Idem
Johannes amerciatur pro perturbio ipsius andree in verbo / vnde dabit dictus andreas in emendam dimidii li' cere ad lumen beati
nicholai et dimidii li' cere ad lumen beate marie in cathedrali ecclesia abirdonensis

Alexander de camera anglicus in amerciamento pro iniusta regrariacione plegij extensi per Stephanum giffard
nomine et ex parte Johannis post magistri cuiusdam nauis de cortkane

the same' dai Johne post and clais his brothir on the ta part / and Alexander chavmer of
Sandwiche and Johne rutour his falou on the tothir part / ar promittit and oblist be the
faith of thare bodyis / and has bundin thare schippis and gudis / that quhilk of the
saidis parties that salbe fundin wrangar' or strublar' of vthir in tym tocum
sal pay xx crownis til Sanct Nicholes wark

Wil burges baxtar in amerciament for breking of common ordinance bath in minysing of the
pais' and baking of evil stuf / for the quhilk it is ordand be the assise that gif
it salbe fundin in tym tocum that he makis sic forfaute / that he salbe secludit fra
the the craft et cetera
Curia legalis balliuorum tenta in pretorio vijo die februarij anno Domini et cetera lxxixno

quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata Willelmus de Kintor fatebatur se debere
Johanni narne carnifici vj s' vj d' / et precipitur eidem per ballivos ad satisfaciendum
dicto Johanni de dicta summa infra quindenam

div.head: Assisa ad Inquisicionem
div.p:
Dauid colison thomas de camera Andreas scherar gilbertus de camera thomas marr
alexander rede gilbertus vaus Johannes vaus Jacobus craik alexander scrogis gilbertus morison
macolmus mowet Dauid Kintor Willelmus blindsel senior Simon de gardin David hil
et Johannes Watson

Eodem die Johannes glenny gener Dauidis mathei constituit eundem Dauid suum procuratorem
legittimum ad prosequendum plegium per ipsum extensum super et aduersus Adam de craufurde
de iniusta detencione xj tabularum orientalium / et ad agendum et defendendum pro eodem
constituen' prout Jura volunt Ipso promittens de Rato cum ceteris clausulis necessariis
et oportunis / Et prefatus Adam promisit comparere coram ballivis hodie ad octo dies
ad faciendum in huiusmodi causa vt de Jure tenetur

Item eodem die Duncanus de leis et henricus bawne pelliparij quilibet in amerciamento
pro iniusta perturbacione adinuicem sed maior defectus reperiebatur cum dicto henrico per
assisam / et tenetur emendare alter alteri ad visum proborum virorum Et pro
dicto henrico gilbertus vaus deuenit plegius legalis de indempnitate dicti Duncanj
aliter quam per viam Juris Et alexander de camera filius plegius pro dicto Duncano eodem modo

Eodem die Jacobus de Kintor primo die vocatus ad sectam Willelmi more responsurus
plegio per eum in manibus David Duncanj seriandi super eundem porrecto de iniusta
detencione trium barellarum salmonum et certe summe pecunie ad bonum compotum
pro vino eidem liberat' per ipsum Willelmum ad propinandum / Non comparuit / quare precipitur
seriendo capere districtum de dicto Jacobo et dare eundum ad plegium / et premunire
ipsum ad comparendum ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam secundum die processus

Eodem die prepositus in plena curia mandavit henrico bawne pellipario quod de ce
tero non teneat preter vnam botham seu opellam ad operandum artem suam seu res
vendend' sub omni pena que competere poterit in hac parte

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio viij die februarij anno predicto / philippus de Dunbrek
seriandus per extensionem manus sue Roberto blindsel vnj balliuorum deuenit plegius pro Jacobo Dou
glas nauta ad satisfaciendum Roberto brekach de x s' infra hinc et festum penthicostes
proximum futurum / qui quidem Jacobus traxit bona sua vniuersa ad liberandum dictum philippum
de huiusmodi plegiagio per ipsum seriandum vbicumque locorum fuerint inuenta fore capienda
distringenda et vendenda sue licencia alicuius Judicis aut ministri Juris donec et quousque quitus
factus fuerit de plegiagio antedicto

Duncanus lambynton et Willelmus cardnach quilibet in amerciamento curie pro perturbacione ville
brigando adinuicem vt reperitur per assisam et in alio amerciamento ipsorum quilibet adiudicatur
pro concelacione perturbij inter eos fact' / Et quia dictus Duncanus obligavit se ballivis per ex
tencionem manus sue quod si inter hinc et festum Sancti michaelis proximo / inueniatur pertur
bator aut concelator perturbij duplicabit ista amerciamenta et soluet amerciamenta futura et cetera
ballivi remiserunt sibi hec ij amerciamenta sub condicionibus prenotatis

The ix dai of februar' the yer' before writin In the balye court haldin in the tolbuth
It wes fundin and deliuerit be ane sworn assise / that Robert betson aw tosayl with
alexander sanchar' as his hyrit man / gif that the said alexander can mak his schip
suffisant with twa tymmir' men in twa daies

the samen dai it wes fundin be the assise / that gelis' schipman salmak Alexander
sanchar' service for this viage to leith / the said alexander payand til him his costis
that is tosay iij d' on the day fra the first tyme / that the said alexanderis schip say
lit furth of Abirdene to the last In cuming

In the balye court haldin in the tolbuthe the xj dai of februar' the yer'
of god et cetera lxxix yeris / anent the action movit betuix John' chepman eldar
and alexander scrogis of certane pewdir weschel / the assise has ordanit and de
liuerit / that the said veschel sal remayn with alexander scrogis to the cuming hame
of thom chepman gif he cumis betuix this and Witsonday / and fal
yeand of his cuming / the veschel salbe restorit and deliuerit til the said
Johne chepman / and alexander scrogis salhaf that he has reson' to / and alexander
scrogis has fundin androw atkyn borch for the furthcuming of the veschel

The same' dai the action' movit betuix Richard of culan and Robert club anent
certane ayrschip clamit be thaim be the deces' of thare modir is delayit
be the assise with consent of bath the parties in hope of concord to this day xv
dais / and that day tobe determynit be the assise in sa fer' as thai can
and thir ar' the names of the assise Dauid colison' John' of Knollis tho
mas fife alexander rede John' Wormot thomas of marr' gilbert of cha
myr William the hay and Alexander sanquhar'

Item the samyn dai the said assise fand a chartir of plane selling made
be John' skynnar' til thom quhite of a tail of a yard of the quhilk
the said thomas is in state and possession' fundin be the assise / of vail tobruke
and ioys' his possession' for ony document sene be thaim in the contrar'
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xij die februarij anno Domini et cetera lxxix /

quo die
ballivi per decretum curie assignauerunt Alexandro rolland diem lune ad octo dies
immediate sequentes ad respondendum plegio per thomam quhite super eum extenso vt Jura volunt
penes vnam litteram obligatoriam de iij barellis salmonum / quam dictus alexander sigillare tenetur ut asseretur

the same dai the aldirman and a part of the consale has put henry bawne and
Duncan leis in frendschip and concord / and has ordand that quhilk of
thame strublis or forfautis agane vthir in tym cuming / sal pay fyve
merkis til Sanct Nicholace wark / and becaus' the said henry wes fundin
in the maist faute of strublance / he is ordanit topay j li' of wax to the
haly blude licht

Item thomas quhite constituit Alexandrum de camera filium Willelmum blindsel seniorem et
Johannem colison suos procuratores coniunctim et divisim in presencia Roberti blindsel et thome prat
ijorum balliuorum ad prosequendum legittime actione suam aduersus alexandrum rolland vt patet supra
necnon ad agendum et defendendum pro eodem constituen' / Ipso promittens de Rato et cetera

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio coram preposito et ballivis eiusdem xiiij die febru
arij anno Domini supradicto /

quo die subscripti electi fuerunt in Inquisicionem videlicet Andreas
scherar' Johannes de Knollis Dauid colison thomas fife alexander rede gilbertus vaus Ed
mundus lowson gilbertus morison thomas de marr' Dauid mathoson Willelmus hay
Willelmus giffard Robertus de Kintor alexander naghty et Willelmus moore burgenses
dicti burgi Quj jurati dicunt quod quondam Willelmus povty auus Agnetis lilburn' la
tricis presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis
de tota et integra illa terra cum pertinenciis Jacente in vico castri ex orientali parte eiusdem vici
quj dicitur le hedraw inter terram hered' quondam Ade de auchery ex parte boriali ex
vna et terram Willelmi de Rattre ex parte australi ex parte altera / Et quod dicta
Agnes est legittima et propinquior heres eiusdem quondam Willelmi aui sui sed nesciunt si sit
legittima et propinquior heres de dicta terra cum pertinenciis / et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra
cum pertinenciis valet nunc per annum xl s' vsualis monete et tantum valuit tempore pacis / Et
quod tenetur in capite de domino nostro Rege in libero burgagio Et quod nunc ex
istit in manibus Ade de craufurde burgensis dicti burgi per vendicionem seu alie
nacionem inde sibi factam per matheum pulty filium et heredem quondam dicti
Willelmi pulty burgensis de abirdene per spacium xix annorum vel eocirca

Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xxj die
mensis februarij Anno Domini et cetera lxxixno / quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata et cetera

Eodem die cristinus prat Johannes huchonson Johannes narn thomas narne et
Robertus carnifices ipsorum quilibet adiudicatur in duobus amerciatis per concessiones
proprias pro iniusta empcione piscium ante horam eis statutam et percepcione vltra j d' de solido

Johannes lilburne in plena curia constituit Johannem malisson Willelmum blindsel
seniorem et Willelmum quelp coniunctim et divisim suos legittimos procuratores ad prosequendum Willelmum
moore super certis bonis per ipsum clamat' ab eodem Willelmo / et ad agendum pro eo prout
ordo Juris exigit et requirit Et promisit de Rato cum ceteris clausulis procurato
rij necessariis et oportunis

The samyn dai it wes determynit and ordanit be ane sworn' assise and pronuncit
be Alexander rede forspekar' of the assise / that gif quhat tym Johne glenny wil bring
a man in his hand before the aldirman or balyeis in Jugement and swere
the gret aith / that he bocht fra Robert evat in Danskyn xx buyrdis and
pait the said Robert for the samyn xx burdis and that the said John' glenny
tuke his aventur' of the said xx burdis hame wart / this beand done
Adam of craufurd as intromettour of the said Robertis gudis sal content and pay /
xj buyrdis til the said John' glenny or his procuratouris / the said John' or his
procuratouris doand til the said adam as nychtbur' and vthiris anent the fraght and
vncostis of the burdis

The samyn dai comperit in Jugement before the balyeis John' fichet schipman and
mastir of a carvel callit Nicholace / and askit at Alexander rede thomas prat
John' symson the said thomas and John' twa of the principal frauchtis men as
he allegis tofree him of the arrest made be Adam bachiller' messinger'
til our souerane lord in the kingis name / and he tomak thame seruice eftir the tenor
of thare condicionis / or ellis to ressaue thare gudis and do til him that law
wil of his fraught / And the saidis Alexander Rede thomas prat John' symson /
and Dauid mathoson sayde in the menetym that thai war content toressaue
thare gudis and do til him that law wil

Eodem die Alexander rolland primo die vocatus ad sectam procuratoris thome quhite responsurus plegio
per ipsum thomam super eundum porrecto Non comparuit / quare precipitur philippo de Dunbrek serien
do capere districtum / et citare ipsum ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam secundum diem processus et penes
vnam litteram obligatoriam de iij barellis salmonum / quam dictus alexander sigillare tenetur ut asseretur

Item eodem die Antonius scissor fatebatur debere Dauid spens x s' et quod satisfaciet
ei de dictam summa infra quindenam futuram / et ad hoc faciendum Jacobus coming vnus ballivorum
deuenit debitor eidem Dauid modo subsequen' videlicet quod si reperire poterit prefatum Antonium
in hac villa ad dictam terram satisfaciet aut satisfieri faciet Dauid spens de dictam summa

Assisa ordinavit cristinum prat deliberare ad lumen Sancti sanguinis j li' cere et thomam
narne dimidium libre cere pro perturbio inter eos fact'

xxij die februarij anno predicto Willelmus carle constituit patricium andree suum legittimum procuratorem ad
petendum et recipiendum nomine ipsius a Johanne skynnar' xxviij d' / et eundum Johannem si ne
cesse fuerit desuper legittime prosequend' in latissima forma procuratorie

The xxv dai of februar' the yer' of god et cetera lxxix yeris / Elizabeth Irwin
grantit that thar is acht til ser Androw Wrycht as chaplan of Sanct Ninianis altar
in the parisch kirk of Abirdene / fovre merkis of vsuale money of annual rentis and x s'
of certane termys bigane of the land and tenement pertening til hir' be reson' of
Junctfeftment liand in the castlegate betuix the land of Alexander menyes on the
west part / and the land of the ayris of vmquhile Androw ancroft on the eist
part / the quhilk land aw to the said altar and chaplan of the samyn yerly xxti
s' of annual / And for the payment of the saidis iiijor merkis of annual byrunnyn and x s'
apon the said land becaus' of the brynning that happinnit of a part of the samyn'
the said Elizabeth has assignit and be this present write assignis til the said
sere Androw Wrycht a mark of vsuale money tobe tane and rasit be him or
his assignais of the said land with the pertinencis and of the tennandis Inhabitantis
the samyn fra thyne furth termly and yerlie at twa vsuale termys of
the yer' Witsonday and martymes in wyntir at ilke terme a mark
togiddir with the annual acht yerly as said is / vnto the tyme that the said
sere Andro be fullely content and pait of the foure merkis / and at the last
terme / x s' of annuel byrunnyn' as said is togiddir with the principal annuel et cetera

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per prepositum et balliuos eiusdem vltimo die mensis
februarij anno Domini et cetera lxxixno /

quo die Willelmus club in amerciamento pro iniusta detencione
iij s' et ij d' a Johanne malisson / et tenetur satisfacere eidem infra terminum Juris

Symon de gardin in amerciamento quia iniuste detinet a patricio stiklaw terciam partem
centi cere / quinque libris cere minus de toto prout deliberat' fuit prius per certos
arbitros vt assisa reperit et pronunciauit / quam summam cere adiudicatur satisfacere
dicto patricio infra quindenam futuram

Duncanus de leis conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento / quia iniuste perturbavit Archibaldum
pelliparium / existen' in seruicio henrici bawne / et dictus Archibaldus quitus de perturbio
dicti Duncanj
Antonius scissor in amerciamento pro iniusta detencione vnius bipennis a Dauid spens

Assisa ad Inquisicionem Andreas scherar Johannes de Knollis thomas de camera Alexander rede alexander
howison Johannes Waus Johannes Wormot gilbertus morison Dauid hil alexander hay Jacobus
craik Johannes glenmalvine et gilbertus leche burgenses de Abirdene Quj Jurati
dicunt quod quondam Angusius lilburne pater Johannis lilburne latoris presencium obiit vltimo
vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem dominj nostri Regis de vno annuo
Redditu xiij s' et iiijor d' vsualis monete exeunt' annuatim de terra sine tenemento
dicti quondam Angusij Jacente infra burgum de Abirdene ex parte boriali vici
castri inter terram hered' Johannis litstar ex parte orientali / et terram thome ma
lisson ex parte occidentali Et quod dictus Johannes est legittimus et propinquior heres eiusdem quondam
Angusij patris sui de dicto annuo redditu cum pertinenciis / et quod est legittime etatis /
et de valore dicti annuj redditus satis patet / Et quod tenetur in capite de domino
nostro Rege in libero burgagio Et quod nunc existit in manibus dicti burgi
de Abirdene a tempore obitus dicti Angusij In defectu veri heredis Jus
suum minime prosequentis et cetera

Eodem die Dauid marr deuenit plegius legalis pro Duncano leis quod henricus
bawne eius vxor et seruitores eiusdem erunt indempnes de dicto Duncano et parte
sua aliter quam per viam Juris

Johannes malisson prosecutus per Willelmum club de xxx d' / quitus factus fuit de cla
meo dicti Willelmi per assisam

The samen dai anent the actionis debatabil betuix macolm mowet as cu
rat til Johne of Kintor son and ayr of vmquhile gilbert of Kintor on
the ta part / and Dauid Kyntor brothir germane til quhilum the said gilbert
on the tothir part / the Assise tharupon chosin and sworn / decretis and deliueris
In the first / that Dauid Kintor sal answer' gilbert Kintorris son' for the
mail of the Sellar' sen the childis entra Alsua thai fynd that the
forsaid Dauid sal ansuer' for the twa croftis to the childe in alsfer
as he tuke thame for / Item thai fynd / that the said Dauy sal remain
with a sext part / of the watir of the Crois to the vsche of the termys of
formaling Item anent the cragwel croft / thai fynd that the said Dauid
sal answer' to the childe sen the entra of the childe Item thai fynd
Dauid Kintor quyte of the twa peissys And belangand the tende
of Dee / the assise ordanis macolm mowet / tobring the testament
and compt buke before thaim this day viij dais / And the said mal
com sal answer' to the said Dauyis clamis / on the behalf of the
childe / and the said Dauid to malcomis clamis in siclike wise / this dai
viij dais / to the quhilk bath the parties has consentit / And thir ar the
namys of the said Assise Androw scherar' Johne of Knollis Dauid co
lison Alexander howison thomas of chamer alexander rede gilbert the Waus'
Johne the vaus Adam of crafurd gilbert morison Johne of glen
malvyne Dauy hil and gilbert leche
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio iijo die mensis marcij anno Domini et cetera lxxix /

quo die
Alexander rolland conuictus per assisam adiudicatur in amerciamento / quia perturbavit iniuste quandam cristia
nam et tenetur emendare parti lese ad visum proborum virorum

Eodem die Johannes echtsy adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta detencione xx s'
a domino patricio Willelmi capellano prout Inuentum fuit et deliberatum per assi
sam / et tenetur satisfacere eidem dictam summam infra terram Juris / Et quia dictus
Johannes blasfemavit prefatum capellanum / assisa ordinavit eum deliberare
vnam libram cere ad missam sancti sanguinis

Item eodem die coram ballivis in Judicio Johannes glenny adduxit Johannem stephani in
manum eius / quia Juraverunt in presencia Ade crafurd penes empcionem xx tabularum orientalium a
Roberto evat in omnibus iuxta decret' assise in antea desuper in scriptis redact' et cetera
